00020 #ifndef __surfit__vec_alg__
00021 #define __surfit__vec_alg__
00022 
00023 #include <math.h>
00024 
00025 #include "fileio.h"
00026 #include "real.h"
00027 
00028 #include <float.h>
00029 
00030 namespace surfit {
00031 
00032 template <class V>
00033 REAL norm2(const V * x, REAL undef = FLT_MAX) {
00034         REAL res = REAL(0);
00035         REAL val;
00036         int i;
00037         for (i = 0; i < x->size(); i++) {
00038                 val = (*x)(i);
00039                 if (val == undef)
00040                         continue;
00041                 res += val*val;
00042         };
00043         return sqrt(res);
00044 }
00045 
00046 template <class V>
00047 REAL times(const V * x, const V * y) {
00048         REAL res = REAL(0);
00049         if (x->size() != y->size()) {
00050                 writelog(SURFIT_ERROR,"Vectors times : wrong vectors size.");
00051                 return res;
00052         };
00053         int i;
00054         for (i = 0; i < x->size(); i++) {
00055                 res += (*x)(i)*(*y)(i);
00056         };
00057         return res;
00058 };
00059 
00060 REAL sum_value(const REAL * begin, const REAL * end, REAL undef);
00061 REAL mean_value(const REAL * begin, const REAL * end, REAL undef);
00062 REAL std_value(REAL mean_value, const REAL * begin, const REAL * end, REAL undef);
00063 
00064 template <class T>
00065 void minmax_value(const T * begin, const T * end, T & min_value, T & max_value) {
00066         max_value = *begin;
00067         min_value = *begin;
00068         const T * ptr;
00069 
00070         for (ptr = begin+1; ptr != end; ptr++)  {
00071                 min_value = MIN(*ptr,min_value);
00072                 max_value = MAX(*ptr,max_value);
00073         }
00074 
00075         return;
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 }; // namespace surfit;
00080 
00081 #endif
00082
